title: WTB:  Hal Chase Blue or Pink Portrait
author: vintagebaseballcardguy

posts.post_title: WTB:  Hal Chase Blue or Pink Portrait
posts.post_content: SGC/PSA 2 or 3 would work for most backs. A solid untrimmed, unaltered raw card would work, too. If it is a rarer back, the card would probably need to be a little lower grade.  Email me front and back scans and price to [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks.

Still looking...[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20190504/4eaa0795853c286f4e2e38cd9e9e584e.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
I have a super nice Pink Chase for you!  (Message sent)

Well, that's one! [emoji106]  

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk

I picked up another pink Chase today.  So far I have the Piedmont 150 and the Sweet Cap 150/?  I can't tell from the scan of the card I bought whether it is 25 or 30.  I need them both so it doesn't matter.  

I could probably make one more purchase this time around if anyone else has one.  A EPDG, Old Mill, or Sovereign 150 would be cool.
